description:
Ranma is frustrated by Yuga and Garga getting all the attention, especially when a mysterious girl shows up and declares herself to be a fan. He decides to prove his worth as a Buddyfighter by defeating Yuga in their ABC Cup match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ranma Moukou! Katsu no wa Ore Dazi!!
Ranma`s Wild Charge! I`m the One Who`ll Win!
ランマ猛攻! 勝つのはオレだぜィ!!
